alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 7:49PM EDT until July 26 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 749 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kinsman, or 10 miles northwest of Sharpsville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cortland, Kinsman, Johnston and Orangeville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
